meanings.definition: Opposed to the belief in equality among all people.
meanings.sent1: The antiegalitarian views led to unequal treatment in the community.
meanings.sent2: Her antiegalitarian stance made her unpopular among her peers.
meanings.sent3: The antiegalitarian cat refused to share its toys with other felines.
meanings.sent4: The antiegalitarian storm cloud cast a shadow over the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The antiegalitarian policy created divisions within the society.

meanings.definition: A person who is against the idea of equal rights and opportunities for everyone.
meanings.sent1: The antiegalitarian spoke out against fair treatment for all.
meanings.sent2: As an antiegalitarian, he opposed the new equality laws.
meanings.sent3: The antiegalitarian at the party refused to participate in the group games.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as an antiegalitarian dragon guarding the treasure of equal rights.
meanings.sent5: The antiegalitarian's actions spoke louder than words in the community.
